类型: Size: 12.5 Wide Women/11 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: These are actualy wide toe box, it feels great to walk in these so much freedom.  I think its helping improve my posture.  The quality is good, lasted more than a month so far.

类型: Size: 13.5 Wide Women/12 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: I didn't realize when I picked these up that they would be the only shoes my fiance would wear. He used to alternate between flip-flops and Hey Dudes, but now these are the only things he slips on other than work boots. He says that they run true to size and are very comfortable. He mentioned that there was no buffer time to wait for them to be broken in as they were the perfect fit and comfort level right away. They clean very easily and are very durable. He's been wearing them every single day

类型: Size: 9.5 Wide Women/8 Wide MenColor: Dark Blue
评论详情: I like these shoes as far as comfort and the wide toe box is nice. However the insole will not stay in place. Every time I take them off the insole comes out and it's not a simple just put it back in there... I have to actually put my hand in and maneuver the insole in place, stuff it down in there to get it all the way to the front of the shoe which is a big hassel. Other than that they're fine.

类型: Size: 11.5 Wide Women/10 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: These shoes fit perfectly. Excellent value for what you're getting. The traction is beyond what I thought it would be. I haven't slipped at all nor have I been caught up on any kind of flooring or carpeting. They are very comfortable and they feel like they're going to be super durable. They are very lightweight and comfortable right out of the box. The toe box is plenty wide that way I don't have to worry about the size of my feet rubbing and being coming irritated. Overall these shoes are absolutely perfect. They breathe well and are going to last for a very long time with proper care.

评论概述: BUHCFBO Men's Slip on Wide Minimalist Barefoot Sneakers - Need 1/2 sizes!
类型: Size: 11.5 Wide Women/10 Wide MenColor: Bright Grey
评论详情: Men's Barefoot Shoes Minimalist Slip on Cross-Trainer Shoes Wide Toe Walking Shoes Zero Drop Sole Trail Running Sneakers Gym Workout Casual  Barefoot shoes mean a lot to different people. If I am wearing Barefoot shoes or sneakers, I want to be able to wiggle my toes and feel like I am walking barefoot without the pain from stepping on rocks, glass, and other debris.  I had high hopes for the BUHCFBO Men's Slip on Wide Minimalist Barefoot Sneakers but they let me down in 2 areas.  First they are not offered in 1/2 sizes. I wear a Men's 10.5 (US). I could only order 10 or 11 from BUHCFBO so I tried the 10. Unfortunately my toes touch the front of the toe box.  Next, I don't have that barefoot feeling when wearing these sneakers. Are my expectations too high? They are OK as slip-on's for walking the dog in warm weather but I would not wear them for running or for a gym workout. I need support at the gym and don't want my toes to be cramped when running.  I'm giving them 3 stars because they are just OK and not something I would order again.

类型: Size: 10.5 Wide Women/9 Wide MenColor: Bright Grey
评论详情: Typically the shoes I get are too narrow. These are not. Very wide, especially near the toes. Very comfortable.

评论概述: Very comfortable and fit like a glove.
类型: Size: 12.5 Wide Women/11 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: I am a really big fan of wide toe shoes.  These are my 2nd pair of wide toes and I really like these ones.  At first I was thinking these wouldn't fit as well as my laced shoes but, I was pleasantly surprised.  These shoes fit like a glove.  There is no slippage whatsoever. The shoes are very comfortable and support my feet well.  I would say they are perfectly balanced.  There is plenty of room for my toes to separate.  The shoes feel very light but also are very durable.  Overall, I highly recommend these shoes.  They do not disappoint!

类型: Size: 10.5 Wide Women/9 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: My husband received these and five minutes later he slipped them on and was gone. I didn’t see him for hours but when I did, he looked like he had been wearing them forever. Not like they looked old and worn, but just comfortable like shoes he had had for a while and just fit his feet like comfy slippers do.  These aren’t his first wide toe box shoes. I’ve ordered him a few pairs because he has wide feet and as he says, whose feet are pointy like lots of shoes. These actually seem shaped the way feet are. I have a pair like these too and I don’t have wide feet but it is nice to have your feet feel free inside of shoes.  With this pair of BUHCFBO Men's Barefoot Shoes, I particularly like the colorof the sole with the black fabric of the shoe. I think they look pretty sharp.  The price for these, around $35, is very reasonable. They probably aren’t the most durable shoes, but will be comfortable while they last.

评论概述: Very comfortabel shoe, not so sure about training in them
类型: Size: 13.5 Wide Women/12 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: These shoes are very comfortable. They have a wide toe and a fairly thick sole. The material is breathable, not typical shoe material. These are nice for around the house, shopping, walks around town, and such. I am not so sure about using them as a cross-trainer as suggested in the title. Although they do have support, I would not feel confident running or doing any lifting in them.

类型: Size: 12.5 Wide Women/11 Wide MenColor: Bright Grey
评论详情: I'm learning to really like these extra wide minimalist shoes. It's very hard for me to find shoes that are wide enough and with a big enough toe box. These hit the sweet spot.  I also like that I can't pin them down as to what kind of shoe it is. It's not quite a slipper, but not a sneaker or dress shoe. It's just another shoe - that I'm happy to wear - in my collection that's growing at an alarming rate.  They are just a tiny bit snug on my upper feet, but that's probably because I don't get out much. The size seems to be accurate and the design is very sensible.  At about ~$30, these are a great buy, no matter how long they last.

类型: Size: 11.5 Wide Women/10 Wide MenColor: Dark Blue
评论详情: Comfortable, good quality and good price

类型: Size: 12.5 Wide Women/11 Wide MenColor: Dark Blue
评论详情: These are ideal for someone with wider feet (4E). These are roomier than the regular ones and fit me perfectly. It has a good grip however, it lacks a good cushion inside. Also, it kind of looks funnier like a duck foot with a wider shoe tip.

类型: Size: 9.5 Wide Women/8 Wide MenColor: Dark Blue
评论详情: I have wide feet. These shoes  are sturdy enough to wear outside.  I wear them all the time now.

类型: Size: 12.5 Wide Women/11 Wide MenColor: Dark Blue
评论详情: These shoes are really comfortable. The upper material is soft and stretchy and the soles are thick and supportive. Also, the toe box is noticeably wider than most shoes and feels great for anyone with wide feet. I’m wearing an 11 which is my normal size and they fit perfectly. Overall, these are great for walking, hiking or just every day use. Highly recommended.

类型: Size: 10.5 Wide Women/9 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: BUHCFBO Men's Barefoot Shoes Minimalist Slip on Cross-Trainer Shoes Wide Toe Walking Shoes Zero Drop Sole Trail Running Sneakers Gym Shoes for Men Workout  The perfect affordable minimalist shoe with a wide toe box, no raised heel, padded interior, very comfortable!  I've been using these for walks around the house to get used to them. I've been experimenting with minimalist shoes to strengthen my ankles, and so far they are helping me a lot!

评论概述: Super comfortable and it looks good too.
类型: Size: 14.5 Wide Women/13 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: Picked this up because I've become one of those people who likes to slip on my shoes and go without having to worry about laces. These are meant for cross-training but in my experience, they work well using in around the house activities. I use them to cut the lawn among other things and they are very comfortable. I also like the look of them; simple black; so they go with whatever clothes I am wearing. All in all, I'm happy with the product. I wish the soles were black as well, but that's a subjective criticism.

类型: Size: 13.5 Wide Women/12 Wide MenColor: Bright Grey
评论详情: These shoes are so comfortable that I don’t see myself training with them. They are breathable and have just the perfect amount of elasticity. The area of the toes is nice and wide. They really make you feel like if you are walking barefoot. I like to use them all day long as home shoes because I work from home. By the way, the arrived nicely packed. The unboxing experience was enjoyable. I can see myself getting another pair.

类型: Size: 13.5 Wide Women/12 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: These are very comfortable and appear to be good quality.

类型: Size: 12.5 Wide Women/11 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: These are a good, comfy pair of slippers, which are true to size, and the fabric that is on the top is even a little stretchy, so you'll be comfortable if you order your normal size. These would be good for walking short distances or going to the gym as long as you're not going for a run. There's some cushion on the bottom, but only a little. I usually don't wear a wide shoe, but these are wider than most and comfortable. I'd definitely recommend them for wearing around the house or short errands, gym maybe not as much.

评论概述: Looks aren't great, but comfort is key
类型: Size: 13.5 Wide Women/12 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: I ordered these shoes for my husband who will undergo a hip replacement surgery soon and needs shoes that don't have to be buckled, buttoned or tied.  These slip-on shoes have a very basic sneaker look and you can get them in three colors.  The shoes come in a "wide" size which is perfect for my husband.  The only problem he has with them is that the back top of the shoe is very flimsy, and he has trouble slipping it on without it bending under his heel.  A long-stemmed shoehorn should alleviate this problem.  That being said, I think these shoes are okay but could be priced more competitively.

类型: Size: 14.5 Wide Women/13 Wide MenColor: Dark Blue
评论详情: I wear a US size 12 Wide, but shoe buying on Amazon has taught me, always go a size larger. Again, this holds true, the 13 Wide fits perfectly, if even a little more snug than I like around the ankle, the foot size is exactly right.  The sole feels a little on the thick side for a "minimalist" shoe, I wouldn't have used that word to describe them. But otherwise, they are comfy to wear and easy to walk in.

类型: Size: 10.5 Wide Women/9 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: Im usually a size 10, i went size 9 and it worked well. Comfy and breathable, but less stylist than in the photos

类型: Size: 9.5 Wide Women/8 Wide MenColor: Bright Grey
评论详情: The wide front did the trick! My toes are not squashed together. These shoes are very comfortable.  I usually wear size 7.5 but these eights work fine, especially with socks.  The uppers ventilate and the lowers absorb shock. The inside soles, where my feet contact, have little bumps that feel great as I walk. They are easy to put on using the heel tabs to assist.  Highly recommended!

类型: Size: 12.5 Wide Women/11 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: First impression, my foot won't fit in that hole, but it did. The top is very stretchy. I don't normally order wide shoes but these fit very nice. I will definitely wear these everywhere.

类型: Size: 12.5 Wide Women/11 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: These are extremely comfortable and lightweight.  I wore them to workout right after I got them.  Went up to 500lbs on deadlifts and they felt great.  Really grippy and you almost feel like you're not wearing anything.The perfect everyday shoe if you're used to wearing only sandals haha

类型: Size: 14.5 Wide Women/13 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: These sneakers feel more like a slipper. I am not saying that that is a bad thing, just comfortable, easy to put on, and as light as any shoe I have ever owned. If they last for very long I would buy them again in a nanosecond. Time will determine that! So far, awesome!

类型: Size: 11.5 Wide Women/10 Wide MenColor: All Black
评论详情: I was looking for a good house shoe. I live in an area where mud and dirt incessantly get brought into the house, so shoe removal at the door is the house rule. I've kept slippers by the door in the past, but I have never been pleased with the ill fit.  I was hoping these would work as a replacement for slippers, and they do. The fit is exceptional (size 10 fits exactly as expected), and the comfort level is good. They keep my feet warm, but the shoe is still breathable. They slide on and off easily, making the 'shoe trade' at the front door quick. The soles grip exceptionally well. These are perfect for my needs.  They look decent, and I would certainly wear them outside - but in my case, they will stay a house shoe. I will probably order a second pair for hiking etc.  The negatives:  These are definitely not name-brand styles or quality. Time will tell how well they hold up, but I expect acceptable longevity.  The price is a bit high. I can get a similar Izod shoe at Costco for less.  And then the 'brand'. I'm not sure BUHCFBO is a real word. I certainly don't know how to pronounce it.  In all seriousness, I like these, and while I have a few concerns, they are exactly what I was looking for

评论概述: Somewhat Comfortable But Look And Feel Like Water Shoes
类型: Size: 10.5 Wide Women/9 Wide MenColor: Dark Blue
评论详情: I like these barefoot sneakers and they're comfortable for around the house.  They do have a nice wide toe box, which is much appreciated.  Unfortunately, they also have a small/tight sewn in ankle opening. This makes wearing socks uncomfortable and they're tight around your ankle which makes wearing them for long periods also uncomfortable.  These shoes also have the look and feel of water shoes. They do not feel like sneakers.  At this price point ( $36.89 as of 10/2024 ) I would not recommend.  We'll be donating them.
